title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.9 - Notice of unfitness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 246.9 - Notice of unfitness

State Regulations

Whenever any food is found to be no longer fit to remain in
storage, the operator of the refrigerated warehouse or locker plant shall
notify the owner of the food of such fact, and a copy of the notice shall be
promptly mailed to the Commissioner of Agriculture and

Markets. Notes

ยง
246.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
